column4: my microphone isn't working (baulk) tried to use skype test call , it is plugged in the same port as when i dual boot to windows where it works , just when i thought all sound worked here, where can i troubleshoot? in alsamixer my mic is like red there is no bar to adjust volume
tru skype sound settings for the used sound device
i turned off skype and thought i would at least do the testing where i can turn up the mike and hear self/feedback in speakers
tools>options>sound devices> switch between OSS n ALSA n check
